import React,{useEffect} from 'react' import Header from '../components/common/Header' import { getCart, getSubtotal } from '../reducks/carts/selectors' import {useSelector, useDispatch} from 'react-redux' import {fetchItem} from "../reducks/items/operations" import { fetchCart} from "../reducks/carts/operations" function Orders() { const dispatch = useDispatch() useEffect(()=>{ dispatch(fetchItem()) if (localStorage.getItem("LOGIN_USER_KEY")){ dispatch(fetchCart()) } },[]) const carts = useSelector(getCart) let totalQty =0 if(carts.length > 0 ){ carts.map(cart=>{ {totalQty += cart.quantity} }) } const subtotal = useSelector(getSubtotal) return ( <>

Order your items

Please check your items and confirm it

{carts && carts.length > 0 && carts.map((cart)=> )}
{cart.item.name} {cart.quantity} ${cart.quantity * cart.item.price}
Total price {totalQty} ${subtotal}






)} export default Orders
